text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
You won't take the next exam……? 
What do you……mean by that?

I failed the License Exam twice. The days spent unable to be at 
Furioso's side during training would continue, and for how long……?

I was putting Furioso's future in to jeopardy. 
So, rather than waiting for someone unreliable, like me……

Ultimately, that would be more beneficial for Funabashi. 
And for Furioso too……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Are you……seriously saying that?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Do you really think that choosing a different 
trainer would be better? If that's the case then——

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
You need to open your eyes! There isn't another trainer except you! 
There isn't one! Anywhere!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
If you can't make it, then we can't! 
Without you, it's over for me!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
It's true that in terms of theory and skill, 
there might be trainers better than you. But, 
to win with someone other than you, that's……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Not something you can call Funabashi's victory!!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: You haven't……forgotten have you?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
How our eyes grew red, crying tears 
of regret about that 『Diolite Kinen』

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Staring out over the harbor, the day we vowed 
『We'll make Funabashi more famous than it is now』

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
For the other Uma Musume who transferred to Central. 
For them it might be fine. Even with a new trainer, 
their dreams can be accomplished. But for me……!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
For my dream! For our dream! 
Without you, it can't come true!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
For our hometown, to make Funabashi more 
lively, to make it shine, our dream……

Her voice——reminded me of the reason for our 
dream. This much was true, to show the appeal 
of Funabashi, it had to be a duo from Funabashi.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: ——I'll help you.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Yes, let's study for the exam together. I'm a 
student so I can enter Tracen Academy's library 
and borrow as many technical books as we need.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
That's why……Let's do our best! Even if it's a long climb, 
we can keep working until you're able to overcome.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Trainer…… 
This isn't for your sake. ……It's for our sake.

So the days of intense days of study began. When we 
couldn't meet up, I studied alone. When both of us 
could meet, we would focus on race knowledge.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Uwah, why are you so fired up today, Furioso!? 
Don't mess with meeeeeee!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
I've hit my target time, so thank you. 
I'll be heading off!

text_block_list.name: Espoir City
text_block_list.text:
Ah, hey…… What's with her? 
She could take it a little easier……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Now now, maybe Furioso just has someone.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Someone she wants to meet everyday, 
someone she wants to support full-heartedly♪

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, that's incorrect. According to this book…… 
Huh? 3 or 4 layers of turf, which one is really correct?

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
When it comes to Taiyaki in Funabashi, it has to be this store, 
doesn't it? An old-fashioned but familiar taste……

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
If it's not from this store, it just feels like it's missing 
something. Alright, after eating let's keep working hard……!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: ——Well then, together.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
(Pass, pass…… Pass for sure…… I pray that 
Trainer is able to achieve success for all their work)
And then——the fateful day, once again.

——The starting line. A place that anyone who 
comes to Tracen Academy will first stand……
We were finally——able to make it here.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text:
Then, Trainer, our first step. 
Lined up together at the gate.

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: Go! Alright, let's do it!

text_block_list.name: Furioso
text_block_list.text: We'll win, for sure!

Our wish is the same. Defeat the Central Uma Musume. 
And then, with a big cheer, someday——

We'll bring it all home to Funabashi, 
the city where we were raised.
